com.pos.device.ped

Interface PinKeyInfoCallback


  • public interface PinKeyInfoCallback
    The callback interface of PIN KeyInfo

    Author：Jewell Email：Jewell.Zheng@newpostech.com 2019/9/20 16:29

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPinInput(int status, int inputCount, int leftTime)
      The PIN Input callback method.
      void onPinKeyInfo(int retCode, PinKeyInfo[] pinKeyInfos, int timeout)
      The PIN KeyInfo callback method.

    • Method Detail

      • onPinKeyInfo

        void onPinKeyInfo(int retCode,
                PinKeyInfo[] pinKeyInfos,
                int timeout)
        The PIN KeyInfo callback method.
        Parameters:
        retCode - the result code, refer to PedRetCode
        pinKeyInfos - the PIN KEYINFOS if success else null.
        timeout - the PIN entry timeout.

      • onPinInput

        void onPinInput(int status,
              int inputCount,
              int leftTime)
        The PIN Input callback method.
        Parameters:
        status - the current pin input status.
        inputCount - the count of pin input.
        leftTime - the PIN entry leftTime.
